message: I've definitely been in the "Convore is way too slow" camp, but everything feels much snappier today. Was there a recently update that addressed performance, or is this just coincidence?

Still feeling as slow as a dog to me. But I'm not up to speed on all perfromance-relatd discussions. I actually came here to inquire if it was only me that found performance had taken a nose dive over the last couple of months.
yes, much faster for me. I hope this holds. I will start using the service again.
Things seem a little faster after the outage yesterday.
I think that was because the service was out resetting all connection still slow here js
Seems faster to me.  Of course there was another recent outage, so maybe the slowness is caused by something like a memory leak that gets temporarily "fixed" with a restart of the app.
or maybe so many users left that it's faster now because of lightened load :P
